topics.body:
Life is like a video game.
It has next gen graphics, amazing processing speed and increases difficulty as you progress.
And it can be both a casual game or a hardcore game. There are also QTEs and quests. You level up as you gain experience and wear gear that gives you bonuses and effects.

You only have one life and one playthrough.

So, make it entertaining and post it onto Afterlife Youtube for all to see. You are a Lets Player and your life is the game.
topics.author: 4fe1b9f47f123b13df002976

"@igotnopicks":/dis/the-time-wasting-thread/post/5586a9786368720c880039e1#post_5586a9786368720c880039e1

Maybe missed an exclusive event?
Or maybe you didn't get that limited time-only items for your adventures?
